build.title: Build Effective
build.subtitle:
With our team, frameworks and libraries,
we create effective software for web, desktop and mobile

grid1.title: Working
grid1.text: With our developers, designers and other members we build effective applications. We update and improve our software each in small periods of time to present the best quality.

grid2.title: Internationalization
grid2.text: Our i18n framework makes it easy for us to produce software for the multilingual space. Even after completion, a language can be easily added without having to change the source code.

grid1.title: Developers
grid1.text: All our frameworks, libraries and software are licensed under the MIT license. That means you can use them for your own products for free.
grid1.node: Nevertheless, always pay attention to the license assignment of the individual products.

grid2.title: Offices
grid2.text: Use our free software to simplify your work in the office and increase its efficiency.
